question1.question: What is the main advantage of using tabulation Dynamic Programming over memorization?
question1.option3: It avoids stack overflow due to limited stack memory
question1.option4: It takes more time than recursive solutions

question2.question: What is the significance of the first row and first column in the dynamic programming table for the 0/1 Knapsack problem?
question2.option1: They represent the maximum profit for each item
question2.option2: They represent the minimum weight for each item
question2.option3: They are always zero, representing the base case where there are no items or the capacity of the bag is zero
question2.option4: They are used to store the intermediate results of the recursion

question3.question: What is the time complexity of filling the dp table in the knapsack problem?
